Title: Unlocked

Plot: A CIA interrogator is lured into a ruse that puts London at risk of a biological attack.
Country: Czech Republic, Switzerland, UK, USA, France
Production: Silver Reel, Lipsync Productions, Bloom, Di Bonaventura Pictures, Czech Anglo Productions, SRA Productions
